Package net.cloud.gfx.sprites

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockLoadRequestHandler  
    BlockSpriteCollection
    A sprite collection which logically groups its sprites into blocks.
    SimpleSpriteCollection
    A SpriteCollection which leaves abstract class behavior as default.
    SpriteCollection
    A collection of sprite images.
    SpriteCollectionFactory
    A simple factory class which will create SpriteCollection objects for a SpriteSet.
    SpriteLoader
    A call which contains the code to handle loading sprites.
    SpriteManager
    The front to the sprite operation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SpriteCollectionType
    An enumerable for the various types of SpriteCollection objects.
    SpriteSet
    Sprites are categorized into groupings, to simplify obtaining and storing them.
